headline: Linde Reports Full-Year and Fourth-Quarter 2024 Results (Earnings Release Tables Attached)
summary: Linde plc (Nasdaq:LIN) today reported fourth-quarter 2024 net income of $1,725 million and diluted earnings per share of $3.60, up 12% and 14% respectively. Excluding Linde AG purchase accounting impacts and other charges, adjusted net income was ...
